subject: My Dear
body:
My Dear 
I am Maria Luisa. I'm a real estate consultant & developer in the USA, that is what I did for a living until I developed a terminal illness.
The purpose of this email is to propose an investment plan to you using my funds (45m USD) with the security company in the USA. Regardless of where you are, in or outside the US, I will be willing to support your business on the basis that 30% of your turnover from my capital given to you would be used for charity donations. if you are honest .Reply me to this email for more details
Sincerely,
Mrs Maria Luisa

subject: Re:   My Dear
body:
Dear Mrs. Maria Luisa,

I'm deeply sorry to hear about your illness. Your proposal sounds interesting and I would like to know more details about it. However, I must assure you that honesty and integrity are values I hold in high regard.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
My Dear   Robert
My heart is satisfied with you receiving this fund.
 I cannot trust anyone further except you. I am very much convinced of what
you can do .Thank you very very much for being here for me . This is what
you need to do now to enable you to receive the funds on my behalf from the
security company. First of all ,thanks for your confident response in
receiving this fund and using it for the said purpose. I would like you to
contact the security company where this fund is deposited, and contact them
by sending them an email, I have notified them today of your contact to
them.
For security measures to avoid fraudsters/scammers intruding in this ,they
gave me the information below to give to you,which you will include in the
email you will send to them.
Secret Question: What Year
Charity Answer: Maria Luisa
Amount. 45,000,000.00 USD
Security Code:2016
The information's above is what you need to send to them and they will
write you back telling you what to do to receive the funds.
You can as well include your phone number just Incase they want to call you.
Below is their contact information
Name of Company. Innovest Portfolio Solutions, LLC
Name of Director of the Fund Transfer Unit. Rick Rodger
Email.
*customerserviceinnovestportfolio@hotmail.com*
<customerserviceinnovestportfolio@hotmail.com>

My Dear please email the security company and get back to me. My dear my
trust is in you and I know that you will not disappoint me ,always pray for
me .
Stay blessed
Mrs Maria Luisa

subject: Re: My Dear
body:
My Dear
What is going on, have you contacted the Security Company ?.

subject: Re: I AM WORRIED
body:
My Dear
What is going on, have you contacted the Security Company ?.  I need an
urgent update from you please .
I am getting worried
Yours sick sister
Maria Luisa

subject: I AM WORRIED
body:
My Dear
What is going on, have you contacted the Security Company ?.  I need an
urgent update from you please .
I am getting worried
Yours sick sister
Maria Luisa

subject: Re: I AM WORRIED
body:
Dear Maria Luisa,

I apologize for the delay in response. I have been trying to get in touch with the security company but haven't received any response from them yet. I will keep you updated as soon as I hear back from them.

Please take care of your health and don't worry too much. Everything will be sorted out soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
